CustomField.description: It stores the progress percentage of a Member who participates in a Mission (Mission Member). Leaderboard Value depends on Mission Type, Objective Type and Objective Value/Field (if applicable).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It stores the progress percentage of a Member who participates in a Mission (Mission Member). Leaderboard Value depends on Mission Type, Objective Type and Objective Value/Field (if applicable).
CustomField.label: Leaderboard Value
